name: Spirits of Spring
description:
From the creators of the award-winning empathy game, Papo & Yo, comes a tale about finding strength.

***
"A powerful, cathartic experience - 4.5/ 5" - Touch Arcade

"Does its own thing, and it does it remarkably well (...) 8/10." - Pocketgamer

"As an allegory of healing, Spirits of Spring takes on the difficult task of cleaning an open wound, and trusts that each player will be able to trace the edges on their own" - KillScreen

"Emotionally, it's meaningful and resonant. (...) Spirits of Spring manages to be a beautiful game about surviving horrible things." - Kotaku

***

Chiwatin, a young Native boy stranded in the northern landscapes of Permanent Winter, is haunted by giant crows. To overcome their cruelty, Chiwatin goes on an inspiring quest to restore Springtime and find the courage to move on.

Inspired by familiar struggles with bullies and isolation, Spirits of Spring is an empathy game rooted in deeply emotional storytelling. Experience the fiercest loyalty in the most unlikely of places!

***A tale about finding inner strength***

Spirits of Spring Features:
• A fascinating 3D world you’ve never seen before
• Use the magic of nature to triumph over the threatening crows and Permanent Winter
• Control your friends’ powers to uncover new paths
• Experience the unexpected consequences of fighting fire with fire
• A haunting dynamic soundtrack, triggered by the player’s actions

***SUPPORT NOTE***
iPod Touch 4th Gen and lower, iPhone 4 and lower or iPad 1 are not compatible with this app.

For optimal performance, we recommend re-booting your device after downloading and closing other applications when playing Spirits of Spring.
